attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is horrible. When I first got on it immediately started to glitch and was slow. Waste of storage.

attributes.title: crashed and had to restart my phone
attributes.review: i’ve tried numerous times to open the app, the first few times it crashed. once i got into the app it glitched so bad i had to shut down my phone. i’m very disappointed in this app and will be deleting it from my phone. my disappointment is immeasurable and my day is ruined.

attributes.title: MADE SCHOOL EVEN MORE RACIST
attributes.review: Because of this app the racism in my school has gone through the roof and all I see is maga hard flags and shirts in the hallways I tried to reset the school but that doesn’t work!!!!!!!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This app stole my location and started crashing my phone constantly. It also started playing step-bro porn out of nowhere.

attributes.title: Battery draining and racist
attributes.review: I opened this app and it drained my battery. It also seems to be a place for racist people. Overall 0/10 experience

attributes.title: DOWN RIGHT HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch right after I downloaded it. Strongly don’t recommend downloading unless you want your phone to mess up.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD 🤬🤬
attributes.review: Basically it caused coronavirus do I need to say more. This app is poo poo it makes my phone itchy and it was all good before I got it. I got it to um keep me UPDATED it does not do what it says it should. Do not get my goldfish died✨✨

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP #tiktok2020
attributes.review: This app made my stuffed pet bunny dissolve!! I’m so mad, I spent 60 dollars on it and I will make sure I never even think of getting this app again 😠😠😠 I am so mad at this app so freaking mad. #tiktokalgorithm ✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿✊

attributes.title: Runs like a carrot
attributes.review: Came here to support my favorite orange cheeto🥵🤬👎 only to discover🙀 he goes to weenie hut junior!!😡😡 Upon closing the app I noticed it slowed my phone down!😳🤯😢 How can I be racist on such a slow app😭😖I will not be supporting orange man😤😤

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: The app stole my chicken nuggets. And I need them so I can have the energy to steal other peoples nuggies but they stole my nuggies first so I can’t steal other peoples nuggies. So I put my phone in the microwave and threw it outside.
